verses.verse: And David <WH1732> consulted <WH3289> with the captains <WH8269> of thousands <WH505> and hundreds <WH3967>, and with every leader <WH5057>.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> unto all the congregation <WH6951> of Israel <WH3478>, If it seem good <WH2895> unto you, and that it be of the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>, let us send <WH7971> abroad <WH6555> unto our brethren <WH251> every where, that are left <WH7604> in all the land <WH776> of Israel <WH3478>, and with them also to the priests <WH3548> and Levites <WH3881> which are in their cities <WH5892> and suburbs <WH4054>, that they may gather <WH6908> themselves unto us: send: Heb. break forth and send in their: Heb. in the cities of their suburbs
And let us bring again <WH5437> the ark <WH727> of our God <WH430> to us: for we enquired <WH1875> not at it in the days <WH3117> of Saul <WH7586>. bring: Heb. bring about
